title: Seas Threaten: an ocean racing mystery
description: High seas homicide and ocean adventure.A competitor in a single-handed sailing race from Plymouth to Newport RI is found floating in mid-Atlantic, his head partly blown away. DCI Tom Tallis, widowed, forty-eight, and himself an occasional yachtsman, flies to the US to investigate, and six of the other competitors—three men and three women—emerge as suspects for murder.Tom soon discovers that the dead man had a disturbingly murky past—but finds it increasingly hard to believe that any of his six suspects fired the fatal shot. Despairing of solving his case, he agrees to sail home to Plymouth as crew for one of the competitors. While at sea, however, he stumbles upon the terrifying solution to his problem at the height of a violent storm…
author: John Malyon
